snippet: A judge ruled that the government’s plan to make Plan B One-Step available over the counter was sufficient to comply with his order to remove all sales and age restrictions.
abstract: Federal Judge Edward R Korman grants Obama administration's proposal to make best-known morning-after pill available to all ages without prescription, ending long-running lawsuit over emergency contraception.
lead_paragraph: A judge ruled that the government’s plan to make Plan B One-Step available over the counter was sufficient to comply with his order to remove all sales and age restrictions.

headline.main: Federal Plan for ‘Morning After’ Pill’s Sale Is Approved
headline.print_headline: Federal Plan For Pill’s Sale To All Ages Is Approved
